description: This JavaScript source file provides functions to fetch a random Thirukural from a backend API, handling URL resolution, response normalization, and error handling. It exports the main function getRandomKural() used to retrieve and normalize Thirukural data.

methods.name: getRandomKural()
methods.description: Fetches a random Thirukural from the backend with intelligent URL fallback and normalization of diverse backend response shapes.

methods.name: normalizeKuralResponse(data)
methods.description: Normalizes backend responses with varying shapes into a consistent set of fields.

methods.name: safeReadText(res)
methods.description: Reads response text safely, returning empty string if an error occurs.

methods.name: truncate(str, max)
methods.description: Truncates a string to a maximum length, adding an ellipsis if necessary.
